participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is a creative and friendly person who enjoys expressing herself through art and sports.
participant_1.background: i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i enjoy coloring books.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is practical and down-to-earth, with a love for good food and a deep connection to his hometown.
participant_2.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.
